Name: val
Desc: Gets or sets the value of form elements in the nodes.
Long Desc: Provides a convenient way to access or modify form element values. When called without parameters, returns the current value of the first element in the set. When provided with a value, sets this value for all matched form elements. This method works with input, select, and textarea elements, making it versatile for form handling operations like validation, auto-filling, or data extraction.
